title: Auth0
description: Auth0 utilizes a modern and distinctive color palette consisting of four main colors, emphasizing their expertise in secure and reliable identity solutions. The deep blue (16214D) reflects trust and reliability, while the bright blue (44C7F4) signifies innovation and security. The vibrant orange (EB5424) offers a touch of creativity and approachability, balanced by a neutral gray (D0D2D3) suggesting balance and stability. These colors are sourced from the official branding guidelines available through brandingguide.app.
